name: Elbub
description: You are a bubble, flying among other bubbles. Relax and go on a journey!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual Core 3.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 (1 GB Memory) or equivalent discrete card (integrated cards may not work) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Quad Core 3.4 GHz or more Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB Memory) or equivalent discrete card (integrated cards may not work) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
